(Well, it could help to meet a bit more about Vamprah and Najah, soon I'll=
 post about Darkfate's)

Name: Vamprah
 Beast mode: Female Vampire

Special=
 Power: "Banshee's Scream", a scream (Ultrasonic and not) that is able to d=
izzy and beat at his enemies or preys; its also can break glass and other t=
hings. She can heard ultrasonic sounds and see in the darkness better than =
others.

 Weapons: Laser gun. She has the skill to use all sort of weapons.=


 Favorite Hobby: Drink blood of big mammals or the energy of her enemies.=


 Behavior: Cool, smart and mercyless. she always try to reach her own goa=
ls, in spite of circumstances. Her bright mind and fatal charming can help =
her to destroy her enemies.

 Description: 

Her helmet reminds a Vampire's=
 head, she could move her big ears and locate her preys whit them. Her helm=
et color is black, her oval face is silver-gray and her eyes have bright co=
lor amber.

 Her armor reminds at Batgirl's design but more scared; it has =
scarce silver lines in; She has black shoulder plates in her shoulders and =
a sort of belt in her waist. Her arms are silver and she has larges nails. =
Her build is sexy and athletic. Sometimes she covers her body with wings an=
d that makes her look her more sinister. Her body mixs silver-gray and blac=
k parts.

 She seems use booths that end below her knees. In her transforma=
tion, Vampire beast's head disappears.

 Weakness: She hates the Sun. Vampr=
ah's eyes can't stand a high light, its painful for her, due that she leave=
s her hideout at sunset or at night.

Background:

Nobody knows a lot about=
 Vamprah, rumours say several things about her: that she's an experiment of=
 Tripedocus Council,  that she belongs to other transformer's race, etc.  B=
ut anything is sure.

************************************************ 

NA=
ME: Najah

ALIAS (es): Belt, worm, over-develop belt, snake, viper, sneaky.=


BEAST MODE: King Cobra                                    

FACTION: Alli=
ance    

ALTERNATE MODE: none

ROBOT MODE: 

When Najah transformed at rob=
ot mode, his upper part appeared when a layer of his "skin" went down. 

Th=
e cobra's head in beast mode was a sort of decoration in his helmet in robo=
t mode; his torso, arms, shoulders, neck, and head were ensconced in. His h=
umanoid appearance was blue-gray; his face was oval, he had almost almond-s=
haped eyes, inclined and red, they were almost joined and they had a devil =
shine. 

He was slim, and his arms were large and thin. In every hand he ha=
d three "fingers" but the points of them ended sharpen craws. He didn't hav=
e feet. Down of his upper part is snake tale. Due his beast mode, he was a =
bit hunchback, and it is painful for his ego.

In Robot mode, a couple of r=
ockets can appears (and disapppears) in Najah's shoulder, let him fly.

FUN=
CTION: Scientist, warrior, murderer, Computer tech-aspects expert, etc.

WE=
APONS: Cyber poison; a blaster; he can throw his saliva, which its made wit=
h acid; Strangle like a python.

HOBBIES/INTERESTS: Computers destroy other=
 bots, Eat out home (All sort of biology's life), destroy all sort of biolo=
gy-life, and a large etc.

TECH SPECS:

Strength:               8-

Intelli=
gence:           10+

Speed:                  10+

Endurance:              =
9+

Rank:                   9+

Courage:                9+

Firepower:     =
         8

Skill:                  10+
